question: when do i get my id card
answer:
I'm not sure when you will receive your company ID card, as this isn't mentioned in the provided onboarding information.

For details on your ID card, I recommend asking HR at hr@company.com or your hiring manager.

question: when do i get my login credentials
answer:
Hello there!

Your email ID, which is part of your login credentials, will be shared by HR on Day 1.

On Day 3, you'll be guided to log in to your company email, set your profile photo, and working hours.
